languages.text: "Могу дать вам слово Навис Нобилите — если честное слово благородного человека имеет для вас хоть какую-то ценность. Я всеми силами оберегал сию станцию от бед и вторжений извне. Заставлял стражу жестко следовать протоколам безопасности, лично отбирал каждого слугу... И преданно охранял Дитя во время переворота".

traits.locale_text: "Могу дать вам слово Навис Нобилите — если честное слово благородного человека имеет для вас хоть какую-то ценность. Я всеми силами оберегал сию станцию от бед и вторжений извне. Заставлял стражу жестко следовать протоколам безопасности, лично отбирал каждого слугу... И преданно охранял Дитя во время переворота".

languages.text: "I can give you my word as a member of the Navis Nobilite — if the honest word of an honourable man counts for anything with you. I guarded this station against calamity and incursions from without to the best of my ability. I forced the wardens to strictly observe security protocols, I personally selected every servant... and I faithfully protected the Child during the coup."
languages.original_text: "Могу дать вам слово Навис Нобилите — если честное слово благородного человека имеет для вас хоть какую-то ценность. Я всеми силами оберегал сию станцию от бед и вторжений извне. Заставлял стражу жестко следовать протоколам безопасности, лично отбирал каждого слугу... И преданно охранял Дитя во время переворота".

I guarded this station against calamity and incursions from without to the best of my ability. I forced the wardens to strictly observe security protocols, I personally selected every servant... and I faithfully protected the Child during the coup."

"I can give you my word as a member of the Navis Nobilite — if the honest word of an honourable man counts for anything with you. I forced the wardens to strictly observe security protocols, I personally selected every servant... and I faithfully protected the Child during the coup."

I guarded this station against calamity and incursions from without to the best of my ability. I forced the wardens to strictly observe security protocols, I personally selected every servant... and I faithfully protected the Child during the coup."

"I can give you my word as a member of the Navis Nobilite — if the honest word of an honourable man counts for anything with you. I guarded this station against calamity and incursions from without to the best of my ability. I forced the wardens to strictly observe security protocols, I personally selected every servant... and I faithfully protected the Child during the coup."

languages.text: “如果你愿意相信一位可敬之人的诚实话语，那我可以以导航宗族成员的身份向你保证，我一直都在尽我所能地守护这座星站，阻止一切灾难与来自外部的入侵。我命令我的看守严格执行安全协议，我亲自挑选出了每一位仆人……而且，在政变期间，我忠心耿耿地保护了圣子。”
languages.original_text: "I can give you my word as a member of the Navis Nobilite — if the honest word of an honourable man counts for anything with you. I guarded this station against calamity and incursions from without to the best of my ability. I forced the wardens to strictly observe security protocols, I personally selected every servant... and I faithfully protected the Child during the coup."

traits.locale_text: “如果你愿意相信一位可敬之人的诚实话语，那我可以以导航宗族成员的身份向你保证，我一直都在尽我所能地守护这座星站，阻止一切灾难与来自外部的入侵。我命令我的看守严格执行安全协议，我亲自挑选出了每一位仆人……而且，在政变期间，我忠心耿耿地保护了这个孩子。”

languages.text: «Puedo darle mi palabra como miembro de la Navis Nobilite, si es que la palabra sincera de un hombre honrado tiene algún valor para usted. Defendí esta estación contra la calamidad y las incursiones ajenas con todo mi empeño. Obligué a los guardias a mantener protocolos de seguridad estrictos, elegí personalmente a cada uno de los sirvientes... y protegí fielmente a la niña durante el golpe».
languages.original_text: "I can give you my word as a member of the Navis Nobilite — if the honest word of an honourable man counts for anything with you. I guarded this station against calamity and incursions from without to the best of my ability. I forced the wardens to strictly observe security protocols, I personally selected every servant... and I faithfully protected the Child during the coup."

traits.locale_text: «Puedo darle mi palabra como miembro de la Navis Nobilite, si es que la palabra sincera de un hombre honrado tiene algún valor para usted. Defendí esta estación contra la calamidad y las incursiones ajenas con todo mi empeño. Obligué a los guardias a mantener protocolos de seguridad estrictos, elegí personalmente a cada uno de los sirvientes... y protegí fielmente a la niña durante el golpe».

languages.text: 「航宙貴族の一員として、私は約束しよう。名誉ある者の誠実なる言葉が、あなたにとって何らかの意味があるのならば、だが。私はこのステーションを、災難や外部からの侵入から全力で守ってきた。私は監視者たちにセキュリティ・プロトコルを厳守するよう強制し、すべての使用人を個人的に選別した…そして、反乱に際しては『子ども』を忠実に守ったのだ」
languages.original_text: "I can give you my word as a member of the Navis Nobilite — if the honest word of an honourable man counts for anything with you. I guarded this station against calamity and incursions from without to the best of my ability. I forced the wardens to strictly observe security protocols, I personally selected every servant... and I faithfully protected the Child during the coup."

traits.locale_text: 「航宙貴族の一員として、私は約束しよう。名誉ある者の誠実なる言葉が、あなたにとって何らかの意味があるのならば、だが。私はこのステーションを、災難や外部からの侵入から全力で守ってきた。私は監視者たちにセキュリティ・プロトコルを厳守するよう強制し、すべての使用人を個人的に選別した…そして、反乱に際しては『子ども』を忠実に守ったのだ」

languages.text: "Ich kann Euch mein Wort als Mitglied der Navis Nobilite geben — wenn das ehrliche Wert eines ehrenwerten Mannes bei Euch noch etwas zählt. Ich habe diese Station nach Kräften gegen Katastrophen und Invasionen von außen verteidigt. Ich habe die Hüter gezwungen, sich streng an die Sicherheitsprotokolle zu halten, ich habe jeden Diener persönlich ausgewählt ... und ich habe das Kind während des Coups treu beschützt."
languages.original_text: "I can give you my word as a member of the Navis Nobilite — if the honest word of an honourable man counts for anything with you. I guarded this station against calamity and incursions from without to the best of my ability. I forced the wardens to strictly observe security protocols, I personally selected every servant... and I faithfully protected the Child during the coup."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann Euch mein Wort als Mitglied der Navis Nobilite geben — wenn das ehrliche Wert eines ehrenwerten Mannes bei Euch noch etwas zählt. Ich habe diese Station nach Kräften gegen Katastrophen und Invasionen von außen verteidigt. Ich habe die Hüter gezwungen, sich streng an die Sicherheitsprotokolle zu halten, ich habe jeden Diener persönlich ausgewählt ... und ich habe das Kind während des Coups treu beschützt."

languages.text: « Je peux vous donner ma parole en tant que membre de la Navis Nobilite, si tant est que la parole d'un honnête homme a la moindre valeur pour vous. J'ai protégé cette station des intrusions et des calamités du mieux que j'ai pu. J'ai forcé les gardes à observer des protocoles stricts de sécurité, j'ai personnellement sélectionné chaque serviteur... et j'ai protégé l'Enfant pendant le soulèvement. »
languages.original_text: "I can give you my word as a member of the Navis Nobilite — if the honest word of an honourable man counts for anything with you. I guarded this station against calamity and incursions from without to the best of my ability. I forced the wardens to strictly observe security protocols, I personally selected every servant... and I faithfully protected the Child during the coup."

traits.locale_text: « Je peux vous donner ma parole en tant que membre de la Navis Nobilite, si tant est que la parole d'un honnête homme a la moindre valeur pour vous. J'ai protégé cette station des intrusions et des calamités du mieux que j'ai pu. J'ai forcé les gardes à observer des protocoles stricts de sécurité, j'ai personnellement sélectionné chaque serviteur... et j'ai protégé l'Enfant pendant le soulèvement. »

languages.text: "Navis Nobilite mensubu olarak söz verebilirim, tabii onurlu bir adamın samimi sözlerinin senin için kıymeti varsa. Bu istasyonu musibetlere ve dış saldırılara karşı elimden gelen en iyi şekilde korudum. Muhafızların güvenlik protokollerini sıkı sıkıya takip etmesini sağladım. Bütün hizmetkârları bizzat kendim seçtim ve darbe sırasında Çocuk'u bağlılıkla korudum."
languages.original_text: "I can give you my word as a member of the Navis Nobilite — if the honest word of an honourable man counts for anything with you. I guarded this station against calamity and incursions from without to the best of my ability. I forced the wardens to strictly observe security protocols, I personally selected every servant... and I faithfully protected the Child during the coup."

traits.locale_text: "Navis Nobilite mensubu olarak söz verebilirim, tabii onurlu bir adamın samimi sözlerinin senin için kıymeti varsa.
